entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
